entity.name: US breaks record with over 77,000 cases of COVID-19 in one day
entity.description: The death toll rose by 974, taking the country’s total to 138,201.

text: President Trump has relented on masks and canceled GOP convention events in Florida. But he is not budging on school reopenings, which he has insisted must happen in person despite coronavirus risks, writes Maeve Reston https://t.co/WDnibKcsN0
